channel.title: Concepts on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Concepts on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Architecture
item.description: This page tells you the architecture and basic concepts in open-cluster-management. Hub cluster Klusterlet Managed cluster Application lifecycle Cluster lifecycle (work in progress) Discovery (work in progress) Application console (work in progress) Governance and risk (work in progress) Multiclusterhub Operator (work in progress) Multiclusterhub Repo (work in progress) Hub cluster The hub cluster is the common term that is used to define the central controller that runs in a Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: This page tells you the roadmap for components in open-cluster-management. Work in progress
